entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Jabba had me eliminate several key members of Valarian's organization. Now that I've done so I've earned Jabba's respect.
entries.journal_entry_description: Jabba himself has asked you to take care of a few things for him.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Valarian has brought in a new spice specialist from offworld. Her name is Delrice Capreese, and Jabba wants her eliminated.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Valarian has a nice long list of outside help she's paying, and you're going to make sure she's wasted her money. Next up is her personal bodyguard. Show him who runs Tatooine.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Valarian has a nice long list of outside help she's paying, and you're going to make sure she's wasted her money. Next up is her personal bodyguard. Show him who runs Tatooine.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Valarian has brought in a new piece of muscle from a distant star system. He needs to be eliminated.
entries.task03_comm_message_text: Tyrok was no match, eh? I expected as much. Valarian has assembled a team in a pathetic attempt to mount various attacks against me. They have set up strategic command at a secure outpost, but I have discovered the location of that bunker. You shall infiltrate this bunker and take out Valarian's team.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: "Tyrok was no match, eh? I expected as much. Valarian has assembled a team in a pathetic attempt to mount various attacks against me. They have set up strategic command at a secure outpost, but I have discovered the location of that bunker. You shall infiltrate this bunker and take out Valarian's team."
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Infiltrate the Valarian strategic command bunker and take out Valarian's team.
entries.task05_comm_message_text: Valarian will think long and hard before she butts heads with me again. I'd kill her, or rather have you do it, but it's fun to watch her squirm. Come back and get paid for your work.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: "Valarian will think long and hard before she butts heads with me again. I'd kill her, or rather have you do it, but it's fun to watch her squirm. Come back and get paid for your work."
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Return to Jabba's Palace so he can reward you for your work.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Valarian has gone off the grid to find an assassin willing to attempt to kill Jabba himself. She's paid him an exorbitant fee. Make sure she's wasted her money for nothing.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Valarian has hired a warlord to run her operations in the Jundland Wastes. He's supposedly vicious, ruthless, and unbribeable. See that he doesn't trouble Jabba anymore.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Valarian has found an expert scout who knows more about small group tactics then anyone in the outer rim worlds. Jabba doesn't want him teaching her soldiers how to fight. Remove him from the equation.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Valarian has hired one of the best slicers coming up through the underground. Since she refuses to switch to Jabba's payroll she must be taken care of.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Valarian has hired a weapon specialist to keep her people on the bleeding edge of weapons technology. Destroy him before he can upgrade their weapons.
